sectionCappArea: Restricted to James Scholars Program students.
sectionNotes: Restricted to Applied Health Sciences. Restricted to students with Junior class standing.
sectionText: This course prepares mentors to become a guide and support system for their first year, James Scholar mentees.  Mentors will gain leadership, planning, and other skills to develop a positive relationship with a mentee.ï¿½  The course is broken into two semesters (1 credit hour in the spring and 2 credit hours in the fall), nd it can be used as a James Scholar Project for both of those semesters.
